column4: am i supposed to be at desktop every time i open the terminal?
but if you ls you will not see what is on your desktop from there
you then need to sudo apt-get update
and I told you it was doubtful you would get that scanner working on that printer
Please note.. we have asked nicely a few times now...
gksudo nautilus is one way, but it can be dangerous, use it then close it immediately
PM the bot please.  so you dont spam the channel
not if it involves that brother printer/scanner
It is a decent photo viewer
